sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormControl, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; import { Bill } from '../bill'; import { BillServiceService } from '../bill-service.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-admin-get-all-bills-form', templateUrl: './admin-get-all-bills-form.component.html', styleUrls: ['./admin-get-all-bills-form.component.css'], }) export class AdminGetAllBillsFormComponent { userName!: string; password!: string; Bills: Bill[] = []; isHidden: boolean = false; checkBillsStatus() { return this.Bills.length != 0; } userForm = new FormGroup({ userName: new FormControl('', [Validators.required]), password: new FormControl(''), }); constructor(private billService: BillServiceService) {} onSubmit(data: any) { this.userName = data.userName; this.password = data.password; this.billService .getAllBillsAdmin(this.userName, this.password) .subscribe((bills) => (this.Bills = bills)); this.isHidden = true; } }

Admin

Get All Bill Reports

Username Required!!

Password Required!! Password should have minimum 8 characters, at least 1 uppercase letter, 1 lowercase letter and 1 number

  • BillID: {{ bill.billId }}, ConsumerID: {{ bill.consumerId.consumerId }}, Month: {{ bill.month }}, Year: {{ bill.year }}, Units Consumed: {{ bill.unitsConsumed }}, Total Bill Amount: {{ bill.totalAmount }}
No Bills Found!
